name: Rockman Xover HTML5
description:
Released in 2022 for the 10th anniversary of "Rockman Xover", here is an HTML5 port of a fangame I put together in 2012.

Special Thanks to:

  • Capcom and the original "Rockman Xover" development team
  • Sprites INC for the "Rockman Xover" sprite rips
  • The Mega Man Network and Midori for original "Rockman Xover" gameplay footage
  • CutmanMike and Splendidland for helping make the original Flash version of this game
  • MultitapMugen and Addark for testing and support
